metadata.name: Vocal Lift Challenge
metadata.description: Keep the relic levitating by sustaining a vocal tone for the target duration.

defaults.title: Vocal Lift Challenge
defaults.subtitle: Keep the relic levitating with your voice
defaults.description: Project your voice to keep the relic suspended. Hold a steady sound for 30 seconds to win.
defaults.instructions: Press "Start Challenge" and keep a steady stream of sound to levitate the relic. Drop below the threshold and it will fall.

ballAsset.altText: Golden orb hovering above a glowing pedestal

defaults.notes: Sound intensity is measured from microphone input. The API should resolve the ballAsset.url to a CDN-hosted image when used in production.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Game title
fields.description: Headline displayed at the top of the experience.

fields.name: subtitle
fields.label: Subtitle
fields.description: Optional sub-heading that appears below the title.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Introductory copy shown before the player starts the challenge.

fields.name: instructions
fields.label: Instructions
fields.description: Optional instructions rendered above the call-to-action button.

fields.name: targetSeconds
fields.label: Target duration (seconds)
fields.description: Number of seconds the player must sustain sound to win the challenge.

fields.name: soundThreshold
fields.label: Sound threshold
fields.description: Normalised microphone level (0-1) required to keep the floating object airborne.

fields.name: silenceToleranceMs
fields.label: Silence tolerance (ms)
fields.description: Grace period, in milliseconds, that the player can dip below the threshold before the object falls.

fields.name: ballAsset
fields.label: Ball asset
fields.description: Image object for the floating asset.

fields.name: stopButtonLabel
fields.label: Stop button label
fields.description: Text for the button that stops microphone capture and resets the session.

fields.name: submissionEndpoint
fields.label: Submission endpoint
fields.description: Endpoint that receives post-game submissions when a player completes the challenge.
